Posts.EditableText: Hello, I'm new to Quest 5 and I'm trying to create a game in french language.  I would like to change a verb in the Core language library "Français.aslx". To be specific, I would like to change the translation of the DROP verb which is "Déposer" by default to another one. How can I proceed? Thanks.
Posts.HTML: Hello, I'm new to Quest 5 and I'm trying to create a game in french language. I would like to change a verb in the Core language library "Français.aslx". To be specific, I would like to change the translation of the DROP verb which is "Déposer" by default to another one. How can I proceed? Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: It should be enough to copy the file francais.aslx into your game directory and adjust the file there with a text editor according to your wishes.
Posts.HTML: It should be enough to copy the file francais.aslx into your game directory and adjust the file there with a text editor according to your wishes.
